task_description: {'component_name': 'Main Container for ElectroMonitor', 'description': 'Primary container for ElectroMonitor implementation: An app designed for EB officers and customers to manage and monitor electricity usage. EB officers can input electricity usage data via a chip, while customers receive notifications about their payable amounts. The app provides detailed electricity usage information to officers and payment notifications to customers.', 'framework': 'react', 'platform': 'web'}
